verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> in the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> in the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> take up <S%H5375><s%> a lamentation <S%H7015><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Thou art like <S%H1819><s%> a young lion <S%H3715><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and thou <S%H859><s%> art as a whale <S%H8577><s%> in the seas: <S%H3220><s%> and thou camest forth <S%H1518><s%> with thy rivers, <S%H5104><s%> and troubledst <S%H1804><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> with thy feet, <S%H7272><s%> and fouledst <S%H7511><s%> their rivers. <S%H5104><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> I will therefore spread out <S%H6566><s%> <S%H853><s%> my net <S%H7568><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> thee with a company <S%H6951><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> people; <S%H5971><s%> and they shall bring thee up <S%H5927><s%> in my net. <S%H2764><s%>

Then will I leave <S%H5203><s%> thee upon the land, <S%H776><s%> I will cast thee forth <S%H2904><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the open <S%H6440><s%> field, <S%H7704><s%> and will cause all <S%H3605><s%> the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the heaven <S%H8064><s%> to remain <S%H7931><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee, and I will fill <S%H7646><s%> the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> with <S%H4480><s%> thee.
And I will lay <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy flesh <S%H1320><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and fill <S%H4390><s%> the valleys <S%H1516><s%> with thy height. <S%H7419><s%>

I will also water <S%H8248><s%> with thy blood <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1818><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> wherein thou swimmest, <S%H6824><s%> even to <S%H413><s%> the mountains; <S%H2022><s%> and the rivers <S%H650><s%> shall be full <S%H4390><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> thee.

And when I shall put thee out, <S%H3518><s%> I will cover <S%H3680><s%> the heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and make the stars thereof dark; <S%H6937><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3556><s%> I will cover <S%H3680><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> with a cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and the moon <S%H3394><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> give <S%H215><s%> her light. <S%H216><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the bright <S%H216><s%> lights <S%H3974><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> will I make dark <S%H6937><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> thee, and set <S%H5414><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thy land, <S%H776><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

I will also vex <S%H3707><s%> the hearts <S%H3820><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> when I shall bring <S%H935><s%> thy destruction <S%H7667><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> the countries <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast not <S%H3808><s%> known. <S%H3045><s%>

Yea, I will make many people amazed <S%H8074><s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H7227><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> thee, and their kings <S%H4428><s%> shall be horribly afraid <S%H8175><s%> <S%H8178><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> thee, when I shall brandish <S%H5774><s%> my sword <S%H2719><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them; and they shall tremble <S%H2729><s%> at every moment, <S%H7281><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> for his own life, <S%H5315><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of thy fall. <S%H4658><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> The sword <S%H2719><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> shall come upon <S%H935><s%> thee.

By the swords <S%H2719><s%> of the mighty <S%H1368><s%> will I cause thy multitude <S%H1995><s%> to fall, <S%H5307><s%> the terrible <S%H6184><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them: and they shall spoil <S%H7703><s%> <S%H853><s%> the pomp <S%H1347><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the multitude <S%H1995><s%> thereof shall be destroyed. <S%H8045><s%>

I will destroy <S%H6><s%> also <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H929><s%> thereof from beside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the great <S%H7227><s%> waters; <S%H4325><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the foot <S%H7272><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> trouble <S%H1804><s%> them any more, <S%H5750><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> the hooves <S%H6541><s%> of beasts <S%H929><s%> trouble <S%H1804><s%> them.

Then <S%H227><s%> will I make their waters deep, <S%H8257><s%> <S%H4325><s%> and cause their rivers <S%H5104><s%> to run <S%H1980><s%> like oil, <S%H8081><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

When I shall make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> desolate, <S%H8077><s%> and the country <S%H776><s%> shall be destitute <S%H8074><s%> of that whereof it was full, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4393><s%> when I shall smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> them that dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein, then shall they know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

This <S%H1931><s%> is the lamentation <S%H7015><s%> wherewith they shall lament <S%H6969><s%> her: the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall lament <S%H6969><s%> her: they shall lament <S%H6969><s%> for her, even for <S%H5921><s%> Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and for <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> her multitude, <S%H1995><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

It came to pass <S%H1961><s%> also in the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> wail <S%H5091><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and cast them down, <S%H3381><s%> even her, and the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the famous <S%H117><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the nether parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them that go down <S%H3381><s%> into the pit. <S%H953><s%>
Whom <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4310><s%> dost thou pass in beauty? <S%H5276><s%> go down, <S%H3381><s%> and be thou laid <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the uncircumcised. <S%H6189><s%>

They shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them that are slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword: <S%H2719><s%> she is delivered <S%H5414><s%> to the sword: <S%H2719><s%> draw <S%H4900><s%> her and all <S%H3605><s%> her multitudes. <S%H1995><s%>

The strong <S%H410><s%> among the mighty <S%H1368><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to him out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> of hell <S%H7585><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them that help <S%H5826><s%> him: they are gone down, <S%H3381><s%> they lie <S%H7901><s%> uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

Asshur <S%H804><s%> is there <S%H8033><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> her company: <S%H6951><s%> his graves <S%H6913><s%> are about <S%H5439><s%> him: all <S%H3605><s%> of them slain, <S%H2491><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%> by the sword: <S%H2719><s%>

Whose <S%H834><s%> graves <S%H6913><s%> are set <S%H5414><s%> in the sides <S%H3411><s%> of the pit, <S%H953><s%> and her company <S%H6951><s%> is <S%H1961><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> her grave: <S%H6900><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them slain, <S%H2491><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> which <S%H834><s%> caused <S%H5414><s%> terror <S%H2851><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>

There <S%H8033><s%> is Elam <S%H5867><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> her multitude <S%H1995><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> her grave, <S%H6900><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them slain, <S%H2491><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are gone down <S%H3381><s%> uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the nether parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> caused <S%H5414><s%> their terror <S%H2851><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living; <S%H2416><s%> yet have they borne <S%H5375><s%> their shame <S%H3639><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them that go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit. <S%H953><s%>

They have set <S%H5414><s%> her a bed <S%H4904><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the slain <S%H2491><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> her multitude: <S%H1995><s%> her graves <S%H6913><s%> are round about <S%H5439><s%> him: all <S%H3605><s%> of them uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword: <S%H2719><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> their terror <S%H2851><s%> was caused <S%H5414><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living, <S%H2416><s%> yet have they borne <S%H5375><s%> their shame <S%H3639><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them that go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit: <S%H953><s%> he is put <S%H5414><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them that be slain. <S%H2491><s%>

There <S%H8033><s%> is Meshech, <S%H4902><s%> Tubal, <S%H8422><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> her multitude: <S%H1995><s%> her graves <S%H6913><s%> are round about <S%H5439><s%> him: all <S%H3605><s%> of them uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> slain <S%H2490><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> they caused <S%H5414><s%> their terror <S%H2851><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>

And they shall not <S%H3808><s%> lie <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the mighty <S%H1368><s%> that are fallen <S%H5307><s%> of the uncircumcised, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6189><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are gone down <S%H3381><s%> to hell <S%H7585><s%> with their weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war: <S%H4421><s%> and they have laid <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> their swords <S%H2719><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> their heads, <S%H7218><s%> but their iniquities <S%H5771><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> their bones, <S%H6106><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> they were the terror <S%H2851><s%> of the mighty <S%H1368><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>

Yea, thou <S%H859><s%> shalt be broken <S%H7665><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> and shalt lie <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them that are slain <S%H2491><s%> with the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

There <S%H8033><s%> is Edom, <S%H123><s%> her kings, <S%H4428><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> her princes, <S%H5387><s%> which <S%H834><s%> with their might <S%H1369><s%> are laid <S%H5414><s%> by <S%H854><s%> them that were slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword: <S%H2719><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> shall lie <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> and with <S%H854><s%> them that go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit. <S%H953><s%>

There <S%H8033><s%> be the princes <S%H5257><s%> of the north, <S%H6828><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them, and all <S%H3605><s%> the Zidonians, <S%H6722><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are gone down <S%H3381><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the slain; <S%H2491><s%> with their terror <S%H2851><s%> they are ashamed <S%H954><s%> of their might; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1369><s%> and they lie <S%H7901><s%> uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them that be slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and bear <S%H5375><s%> their shame <S%H3639><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them that go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit. <S%H953><s%>

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> them, and shall be comforted <S%H5162><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his multitude, <S%H1995><s%> even Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his army <S%H2428><s%> slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I have caused <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> my terror <S%H2851><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living: <S%H2416><s%> and he shall be laid <S%H7901><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them that are slain <S%H2491><s%> with the sword, <S%H2719><s%> even Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his multitude, <S%H1995><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
